productpage.productpageb2b_document_Verification_sec: Your document(s) are under verification. You would receive an email once there is an update.
productpage.productpageb2b_document_rejection_sectio: Some of your document(s) has been rejected. Please update the same
productpage.productpageb2b_documents_expired_section: Some of the document(s) has been expired
productpage.productpageb2b_documents_verification_re: Document(s) verification would be required to view pricing of the product.
